title: vaDivEl murugan
sahitya:
vaDivEl murugan aDiyE tuNaiyena piDittiniyEnum nI pizhaittiDu manamE


anupallavi

  paDimEl aDiyAr paDum iDarellAm aDiyODarukkavE vaDa pazhani sirakkum


caraNam    iDukkaNNurum pOdu idayam iDiyum pOdu taDukkum tiranillAdadu tavittayarum pOdu
miDukkellAm viDuttu aDaikkalam enravanai aDaivOrkkuDanE abhayamaLikkum
